scripts.jekyll:dev: bundle exec jekyll serve -H localhost --livereload -- force_polling
scripts.jekyll:build: bundle exec jekyll clean && JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build -c _config.yml,_config_production.yml
scripts.build: npm run tailwind:minify && npm run jekyll:build
scripts.netlify:build: npm run tailwind:minify && ruby _scripts/fetch_and_generate.rb && ruby _scripts/generate_categories.rb && npm run jekyll:build
